1.0.name: wordpress/fruit-wp-functions
1.0.description:
Currently includes:

Youtube feed shortcode - [ffytfeeds].

Displays date-sorted list of videos from a comma-seperated list of youtube author names.

Attributes: * authors: a comma-seperated list of YouTube authors, e.g jefmajor,AlanJakubovic,etc. * count: the (max) number of videos to fetch from each author. Default is 5. * width: the numeric width (in pixels) of the displayed videos. Default is 640. * showtitles: if set to true, displays "Author Name - Video title (date)" at the top of each video. Default is false.
